Our graduates make a significant impact on the College and the community through important programs and organizations, including the Peoria Medical Alumni Council and the Senior Scholar Group . By better serving and engaging our valued alumni, UICOMP fosters a rewarding environment that benefits medical students, residents, and the community. For more information, please call 309-680-8613. To update your contact information, please email [email protected] .
